mapper.select: SELECT /* CsCustCnslInfo.getCsOrdGoodsData */ CCOGI.CCN_NO , CCOGI.ORD_NO , CCOGI.GOODS_NO , PGB.GOODS_NM , PGB.ENTR_NO , EEB.ENTR_NM , EMB.MBR_NO , EMB.MBR_NM , EMB.MBR_NM AS NO_MASKING_MBR_NM , EMB.LOGIN_ID , EMB.LOGIN_ID AS NO_MASKING_LOGIN_ID , EMRAI.RFD_ACTN_NO FROM CS_CUST_CNSL_INFO CCCI , CS_CCN_ORD_GOODS_INFO CCOGI LEFT OUTER JOIN PR_GOODS_BASE PGB ON CCOGI.GOODS_NO = PGB.GOODS_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ET_ENTR_BASE EEB ON PGB.ENTR_NO = EEB.ENTR_NO , ET_MBR_BASE EMB LEFT OUTER JOIN ET_MBR_RFD_ACTN_INFO EMRAI ON EMB.MBR_NO = EMRAI.MBR_NO WHERE CCCI.CCN_NO = CCOGI.CCN_NO AND CCCI.MBR_NO = EMB.MBR_NO AND CCCI.CCN_NO = #{ccnNo} ORDER BY CUST_CNSL_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1
